.. currentmodule:: pysdic

Create surface meshes into 3D embedded space
=================================================

.. contents:: Table of Contents
   :local:
   :depth: 2
   :backlinks: top

The package ``pysdic`` provides functions to create 3D surface meshes from heightmap functions or point clouds.
The meshes can be used in Stereo Digital Image Correlation (SDIC) analyses or for visualization purposes.

Triangle 3 Meshes
-----------------------

Create a 3D surface mesh using 3-node triangular elements based on a heightmap function defined over a 2D grid.

.. autosummary::
   :toctree: ../generated/

   create_triangle_3_heightmap
   create_triangle_3_axisymmetric
